post.body:
Tucker really knows what's going on, great monologue on how culture is tied to and equally important to economics and how neoconservatives have sold out the country.

http://127.0.0.1:43110/1uPLoaDwKzP6MCGoVzw48r4pxawRBdmQc/data/users/1CCP6W73N9r9WwjRUvz3yJ9X7zeY5tStFE/Tucker%20-%20Leaders%20show%20no%20obligation%20to%20American%20voters-mSuQ-AyiicA.mp4

comment.body: Must-watch for anyone interested in online privacy.

While he's probably right about the practicality of living on Mars in this particular case, I don't understand why people look at him as a scientific authority, he's an engineer that now works as an actor.
